title: Shingata Jii (5-daime) LT-AM-3501
original_name: 新型 Jii (5 代目) LT-AM-3501
sinopse: Commercials by Takashi Taniguchi for the 5th generation of Lightec Inc.'s Jii LT-AM-3501 USB-rechargeable lighters. These include four web-exclusive commercials set in an office and one TV commercial set in a park.
